lines.dialogueText: Ah, welcome! You’ve got the eyes of a trader, don’t you?
Lesson one—know what you’re selling, inside and out.
I sell spices from the Eastern Isles. I know where each seed was grown, what dish it suits, and what story it tells.
If you don’t believe in your goods, how can you expect others to buy them?
And listen to your buyers. A good merchant listens more than he speaks.
